    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static void create(Path input,
                          Diagram.Template template,
                          Params<?> params,
                          Path output,
                          SampleSummary summary,
                          SampleSummary... summaries)
                   throws IOException
        Create a performance diagram.
        Parameters:
        input - the input data
        template - the Gnuplot template to use
        params - the diagram parameters (x-axis)
        output - the output file
        summary - the first summary data
        summaries - the rest of the summary data
        Throws:
        IOException - if the diagram generation fails
        NullPointerException - of one of the parameters is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the params, generation and fitness doesn't have the same parameter count

      • main

        public static void main(String[] arguments)
                 throws Exception
        Throws:
        Exception
